ValidationRule.description: If case is closed and record type Console CS - Lightning Case, this checks required QA section fields.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( $User.Id <>"005700000016aec", /* 'sfdc admin' User */ AND ( RecordType.Name = 'Console CS - Lightning', OR ( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Closed'), Done_In_One__c ), OR (
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Category__c , 'I - Product/Item Issue'), OR ( ISPICKVAL(Details__c, 'No Claim'), ISPICKVAL(Details__c, 'Freight Claim'), ISPICKVAL(Details__c, 'Not Sure of Claim'), ISPICKVAL(Details__c, 'Damaged Product/Item') ) ),
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Category__c , 'I - Credit'), OR ( ISPICKVAL(Details__c, 'Ordered Incorrectly'), ISPICKVAL(Details__c, 'Vendor Credit') ) ),
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Category__c , 'I - Delivery Issue'), ISPICKVAL(Details__c, 'Driver/Truck Complaint') ) ) ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT(Customer_Expectations_from_Veritiv__c)), OR ( ISBLANK(CS_MAX_Order_Number__c), ISNULL(CS_MAX_Order_Number__c) ), ISBLANK(TEXT(Order_Type_del__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The following fields are required: What are the Customers' expectations?, Order Type, and Order Number.
